_description: This file defines the available commands in the dropdown menu and application configuration. It contains two main sections: _config for app settings and individual command definitions.

_config.description: Application configuration settings that control default behavior

_command_properties.description: Properties available for each command definition
_command_properties.command: The actual SSH command to execute on the remote VM (REQUIRED)
_command_properties.responses: Dictionary of response patterns for interactive commands (optional) - format: {"pattern": "response"}
_command_properties.disconnect: Set to true if the command will disconnect/reboot the VM (optional, default: false)
_command_properties.requires_extra_input: Set to true if the command needs additional user input (optional, default: false)
_command_properties.prompt: The prompt text to show when requires_extra_input is true (optional)
_command_properties.warning: Set to true if the command should show 'Are you sure?' confirmation (optional, default: false)

_usage_instructions.adding_commands: To add a new command, add a new entry with a unique name as the key
_usage_instructions.modifying_commands: To modify existing commands, edit the properties in place
_usage_instructions.restart_required: Restart the application after making changes to see them take effect
_usage_instructions.config_changes: Changes to _config section take effect immediately without restart

_documentation: See COMMANDS.md for detailed examples and advanced configuration options.
